summary:
BBP Mesh Support
TBBP Mesh UnSupport?Waiting
descriptionHtml:
SOME ANIMATIONS APPLY TO BOTH MALE AND FEMALE.
IF YOU WANT THIS TO APPLY ONLY TO YOUR CHARACTER OR FEMALE ONLY, USE FNIS AND PC EXCLUSIVE ANIMATION PATH


- Install
-- Data folder Copy and Paste
-- Animation bug fix Tips (2013/01/07) New!


- Recommended mod
-- PC Exclusive Animation Path
--- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14871
-- Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS
--- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811
-- The skeleton of female models
--- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11064


- Introduction movie  
-- Female Animation Pack 2013/01/01 
--- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZyN9KbiSmws
-- Female Animation Pack 2013/01/01 BBP 
--- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pvsrp0Djl84


Data\\Meshes\\actors\\character\\animations
